OneSocialWeb

Methods for interacting with a OneSocialWeb server using Strophe.js.

Parameters

optionsan object containing options for connecting to a OneSocialWeb server
Summary
OneSocialWebMethods for interacting with a OneSocialWeb server using Strophe.js.
Properties
options. callbackA map of user-defined callbacks
options. callback. connectionInvoked every time the connection status is updated
options. callback. connectionInvoked when a connection has been established
options. callback. connection_failedInvoked when the connection has failed
options. callback. presenceInvoked when a presence message is received
options. callback. avatarInvoked when a user’s avatar has been changed
Functions
authenticateAuthenticates with a OneSocialWeb server using the specified credentials.
contactsRequests a list of the current user’s contacts from the server.
inboxList the inbox of activities for the current user.
statusUpdate the status of the current user
followSubscribes the current user to the activity stream of the specified user.
unfollowUnsubscribes the current user to the activity stream of the specified user.
add_contactAdds a new contact to the rooster
confirm_contactConfirm the addition of a contact
vcardRequest a VCARD of a specified user.
update_contactUpdates a contact in the rooster

Properties

options. callback

A map of user-defined callbacks

options. callback. connection

Invoked every time the connection status is updated

Parameters

statusThe current Strophe.Status

options. callback. connection

Invoked when a connection has been established

options. callback. connection_failed

Invoked when the connection has failed

options. callback. presence

Invoked when a presence message is received

Parameters

fromThe Jabber identifier of the user whose presence has been updated
showA description of their current presence

options. callback. avatar

Invoked when a user’s avatar has been changed

Parameters

jidThe Jabber identifier of the user whose avatar has been updated
dataPNG image data of the new avatar

Functions

authenticate

authenticate = function(username,
domain,
password)

Authenticates with a OneSocialWeb server using the specified credentials.

Parameters

usernameXMPP username
domainDomain of the XMPP server
passwordPlain text password of the XMPP username

contacts

contacts = function()

Requests a list of the current user’s contacts from the server.  This will call the options.callback.contact function when each contact is received from the server.

inbox

inbox = function()

List the inbox of activities for the current user.

status

status = function(text)

Update the status of the current user

Parameters

textThe status update

follow

follow = function(jid,
callback)

Subscribes the current user to the activity stream of the specified user.

Parameters

jidThe Jabber identifier of the user to ‘follow’
callbackA function which is called when the ‘follow’ request is successful

unfollow

unfollow = function(jid,
callback)

Unsubscribes the current user to the activity stream of the specified user.

Parameters

jidThe Jabber identifier of the user to ‘follow’
callbackA function which is called when the ‘unfollow’ request is successful

add_contact

add_contact = function(jid)

Adds a new contact to the rooster

Parameters

jidThe Jabber identifier of the user to add

confirm_contact

confirm_contact = function(jid,
group)

Confirm the addition of a contact

Parameters

jidThe Jabber identifier of the user requesting to be a contact
groupThe name of the group which this contact should belong to

vcard

vcard = function(jid)

Request a VCARD of a specified user.

Parameters

jidThe Jabber Identifier of the user you wish to request the VCARD

update_contact

update_contact = function(jid,
name,
groups)

Updates a contact in the rooster

Parameters

jidThe Jabber identifier of the user you wish to update
nameName of the contact
groupsA list of group names
